TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UrlPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UrlPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 对控件用来标识包含 URL 值的字符串属性的特性进行定义。

span.span: Defines the attribute that controls use to identify string properties containing URL values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 特性是应用于表示 URL 的控件属性的特性。The attribute is an attribute applied to a control property that represents a URL. 除了将字符串属性标记为表示 URL，该 属性还定义 属性，该属性标识可用于根据属性进行筛选的特定文件类型。In addition to marking a string property as representing a URL, the attribute defines the property that identifies specific file types that can be used to filter against the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个实现 URL 特定属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中， 特性应用于类的 `TargetUrl` 属性 `CustomHyperLinkControl` 。In this code example, a attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 该属性为 ASP.NET 文件设置特定的文件筛选器。The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 设置为值 "\*." 的属性初始化类的默认实例 \* 。A default instance of the class is initialized with the property set to the value "\*.\*". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个实现 URL 特定属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中，将默认 属性应用于 `TargetUrl` 类的属性 `CustomHyperLinkControl` 。In this code example, a default attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 该属性指示支持所有 URL 类型，并指定设置为 "\*." 的默认文件筛选器 \* 。The attribute indicates support for all URL types and specifies a default file filter set to "\*.\*". [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将 属性设置为指定的字符串。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property to the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建的类的实例使用设置为的属性进行了初始化 `filter` 。An instance of a class created with this constructor is initialized with the property set to `filter`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个实现 URL 特定属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中， 特性应用于类的 `TargetUrl` 属性 `CustomHyperLinkControl` 。In this code example, a attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 该属性为 ASP.NET 文件设置特定的文件筛选器。The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取与 URL 特定属性关联的文件筛选器。

span.span: Gets a file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

value.span: 与 URL 特定属性关联的文件筛选器。

span.span: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器基于属性在文件选择器中提供筛选器 。A designer provides a filter in file selectors based on the attribute. 默认情况下，它初始化为 "\*. \* "，它指定具有文件扩展名的所有文件。By default, it is initialized to "\*.\*", which specifies all files with a file extension. 您可以为更具体的文件类型设置筛选器;例如，筛选器 " \* .aspx" 指示只有 ASP.NET 文件由 URL 特定属性表示。You can set the filter for more specific file types; for example, the filter "\*.aspx" indicates that only ASP.NET files are represented by the URL-specific property.
